TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

summary.span: 表示 控件的样式和一些 Web 部件。

span.span: Represents the style for the control and some Web Parts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于表示表控件的样式。The class is used to represent the style for a table control. 它封装的属性，控制的表的外观可以应用于多个表控件，以提供通用外观。It encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a table and can be applied to multiple table controls to provide a common appearance. 你可以指定要通过设置表的背景中显示的图像属性。You can specify an image to display in the background of the table by setting the property. 由控制的表的单元格之间的间距大小属性。The amount of spacing between the cells of a table is controlled by the property. 使用指定的单元格的内容和单元格边框之间的间距属性。The spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border is specified using the property. 你可以指定是否通过设置显示单元格边框属性。You can specify whether cell borders are displayed by setting the property. 与 Web 窗体页上的其他元素之间的关系表的水平对齐方式由属性。The horizontal alignment of the table in relation to other elements on the Web Forms page is indicated by the property. > [!NOTE] > 此类主要由控件开发人员使用。This class is primarily used by control developers. ## Examples 下面的示例创建对象，然后使用方法将它应用到一个已生成对象。The following example creates a object and then uses the method to apply it to a generated object.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The control associated with the style.

summary.span: 将有关背景图像、单元格间距、单元格填充、网格线和对齐方式的信息添加到要呈现的特性列表中。

span.span: Adds information about the background image, cell spacing, cell padding, gridlines, and alignment to the list of attributes to render.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。This method is primarily used by control developers.

.property instance string BackImageUrl
Public Overridable Property BackImageUrl As String

summary.span: 获取或设置要在表控件的背景中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display in the background of a table control.

value.span: 要在表控件的背景中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of an image to display in the background of a table control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定要在表控件的背景中显示图像的 URL。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display in the background of the table control. > [!NOTE] > 将平铺图像，如果小于表。The image will be tiled if it is smaller than the table. 同样，如果它大于表裁剪图像。Similarly, the image is cropped if it is larger than the table. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 背景图像的 URL 被设置为 。

span.span: The URL of the background image was set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellPadding { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellPadding
Public Overridable Property CellPadding As Integer
public: virtual property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置单元格内容和单元格边框之间的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of the cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 单元格内容与单元格边框之间的距离（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell. 同一列的数据列表控件中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元格宽度。All cells in the same column of a data listing control share the same cell width. 因此，如果一个单元格的内容的长度超过同一列中的其他单元格的内容的填充量应用到宽的单元格。Therefore, if the content of one cell is longer than the content of other cells in the same column, the padding amount is applied to the widest cell. 与此单元格宽度也设置列中的所有其他单元格。All other cells in the column are also set with this cell width. 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格共享的高度相同。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same height. 填充量应用于行中最高的单元格的高度。The padding amount is applied to the height of the tallest cell in the row. 同一行中的所有其他单元格设置与此单元格高度。All other cells in the same row are set with this cell height. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的距离设置为小于 的值。

span.span: The specified distance is set to a value less than .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int CellSpacing { get; set; }
.property instance int32 CellSpacing
Public Overridable Property CellSpacing As Integer
public: virtual property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置表单元格之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the distance between table cells.

value.span: 表单元格之间的距离（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The distance (in pixels) between table cells.

value.span: 默认值为 ，指示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制数据列表控件中的相邻单元格之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a data listing control. 在垂直方向和水平应用此间距。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. 该单元格间距是一致的整个数据列表控件。The cell spacing is uniform for the entire data list control. 不能指定每个行或列之间的单个单元格间距。Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 如果你设置此属性的值大于`0`并设置属性到一个值，显示单元格边框，间隔显示相邻的单元格边框之间。If you set this property to a value greater than `0` and set the property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells. 在此情况下，属性控制的差异大小。In this situation, the property controls the size of the gap. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的距离设置为小于 的值。

span.span: The specified distance is set to a value less than .

span.span: Copies non-blank elements from the specified style, overwriting existing style elements if necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines GridLines { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines GridLines
Public Overridable Property GridLines As GridLines
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::GridLines GridLines { System::Web::UI::WebControls::GridLines get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::GridLines value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否显示表控件的单元格之间的边框。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the border between the cells of the table control is displayed.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定是否显示数据列表控件的单元格之间的边框。Use the property to specify whether the border between the cells of the data list control is displayed. 此属性设置的其中一条枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||将不显示任何单元格边框。No cell border is displayed.| ||显示仅数据列表控件中单元格的上限和下限边框。Only the upper and lower borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| ||仅左侧和右侧的数据列表控件中的单元格显示边框。Only the left and right borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| ||显示所有数据列表控件中的单元格的边框。All borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的值不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The specified value is not one of the enumeration values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign
Public Overridable Property HorizontalAlign As HorizontalAlign

public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign HorizontalAlign { System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::HorizontalAlign value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置表在其容器内的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the table within its container.
One of the enumeration values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定在其容器内的数据列表控件的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the data list control within its container. 此属性设置的其中一条枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| ||表是在其容器内左对齐。The table is left justified within its container.| ||表是在其容器内居中。The table is centered within its container.| ||表将在其容器内右对齐。The table is right justified within its container.| 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state.

exception.span: 指定的水平对齐方式不是 枚举值中的一个。

span.span: The specified horizontal alignment is not one of the enumeration values.

public: override void MergeWith(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style ^ s);

span.span: The style to copy.

span.span: Copies non-blank elements from the specified style, but will not overwrite any existing style elements.

summary.span: 清除样式的任何定义的样式元素。

span.span: Clears any defined style elements of the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除任何已定义的样式元素，并使样式保持处于默认状态。Clears any defined style elements, and leaves the style in the default state.
